name: Curses and Goblins
description:
Try to keep up with the stronger and stronger goblins by finding more powerful items, while weighed down by cursed weaponry that won’t let you drop it. Merchants can help you out, but it’s up to you to make sure you’re getting a good deal!

You must guess enemy behavior to win your fights, but they don’t act totally randomly: Goblins will perform every move they can in a random order, before repeating in another random sequence. It is a game of luck, attention, and planning. (I hope.)
